name: Long-Faced Dove
description: Adapted from Paul McGee of RPM Italian in Chicago, this cocktail is tart from fresh lime and pink grapefruit, with a touch of bitterness from Campari.
recipeIngredient: 4 1/2 ounces fresh pink grapefruit juice, from 3 to 4 grapefruits
4 1/2 ounces lime juice, from about 9 limes
2 ounces simple syrup (or more to taste, see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine tequila, Campari, grapefruit juice, lime juice, and simple syrup in a serving pitcher. Add 2 cups ice and stir for 15 seconds. Add ginger beer and stir gently.
Divide cocktail between 6 glasses and garnish with lime wheel.
